messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.talks

LGTM

http://codereview.appspot.com/6501088/diff/1/present/doc.go
File present/doc.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/6501088/diff/1/present/doc.go#newcode26
present/doc.go:26: Strings enclosed by `backticks` will be code formatted
i don't know what "code formatted" means. how about
Strings enclosed in `backquotes` will be presented as source code.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=87a623817669&repo=talks ***

go.talks/present: document `code` convention

R=golang-dev, r
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6501088
